test_max()[source]¶

Test the ‘max’ accessor of the object. A value more than one (1.0) should raise a ValueError. :return: None

test_mid()[source]¶

Test the ‘mid’ accessor of the object. :return: None

test_min()[source]¶

Test the ‘min’ accessor of the object. A value less than zero (0.0) should raise a ValueError. :return: None

test_res()[source]¶

Test the ‘res’ accessor of the object. Residual water content must be less than the minimum value (but larger than zero). :return: None
